name: Obsession_The Complete Version
description:
Summary:

The story revolves around you (the Protagonist) who struggles in her life after the untimely demise of her husband. She has to put up with her husband’s brothers who have taken it upon themselves to make her life even more miserable.

One of his brother’s is obsessed with her while the other one blames her for his brother’s death.

This is an exciting journey which will take you on a trajectory full of emotions and betrayals during your   search for love and comfort…

 

Characters:

 

You the player will be the protagonist.

 

Sasuke, your sainted husband’s brother who is in love with you. He will do anything to have you in the palm of his hand.

 

Daiki, older brother of your husband, who hates your guts and cannot tolerate your existence in the house.

 

Shane Brown, your friend from the past who is a well known businessman who has his own ulterior motives.

 

Yumi. Daiki’s daughter.

 

 

Takano’s (your sainted husband) mother who is the only support during your hard times.

 

Mikasa, Sasuke’s girlfriend.

 

Additional note:

The game has sound effects (e.g. thunderstorm, waves, night ambiance etc) and background music, please adjust your volume accordingly.
